section.title: Overview
section.p: A threshold is a definition of a usage counter, or bucket boundary, or limit, and an associated set of actions to take upon crossing that boundary or limit. A threshold profile group contains at least one-threshold profile. A threshold profile contains at least one threshold. The threshold information is defined in a single Threshold Profile Group table. The threshold is embedded within the threshold profile which in turn is embedded within the threshold profile group.
Operators can configure the thresholds using the Thresholds option from the Common tab on the SM GUI.
